channel.title: Banking all items in invent
channel.description:
i am thinking if adding a clan war to my server however i just need 1 piece of data, maybe more :)
i know exactly what im doing but i want to make it so that when you enter your team you get all your items that are equiped or in your invent deleted or banked (preferbly banked)
then i shall just add the objects u find in myself
does any1 know how to delete or bank every item that is in your inventory?

item.title: Banking all items in invent
item.dc:creator: @happy2help happy2help
item.description:
@happy2help wrote:

i meen… when i use a sara flag on the sara portal i managed to make it so it unequips and deletes all of ure items and thenput u inside game with items but, i want to bank the items instead of deleting them as it seems a bit unfair to delete someones items

Read full topic

i think there was a tut in the tuts section that allowed you to bank every item in your inventory…
highly possible
